name: All Nighter
stats: Target student commits double towards a project. Gains Burnout (cannot commit during the next turn).
flavorText: More hours means more productivity, right?  I can see aliens now!

name: Job Interview
stats: Target student has -1 base commit for 2 turns.
flavorText: Wait, what's Polymorphism again?

name: Semester Starts
stats: Replace one of your own students with one from top of deck.
flavorText: Oh no I'm poor again.

name: Mentoring Cabinet
stats: Look at top 3 cards in the action deck. Add one to your hand and discard the rest.
flavorText: It's everything we could ever need and so much more!

name: Box Fort
stats: Prevent a Software Bug (when a Software Bug is played, negate its effect).
flavorText: Your authority is not recognized inside fort kickass!

name: Switch Majors
stats: Remove a Co-op from target student; that studen'ts company draws an action card.
flavorText: To be or not to be?  I don't know, why not.

name: Requirements Change
stats: Reveal a project from the top of the deck. Replace one of your projects and apply half of its completed progress to the new project.
flavorText: We want you do make a red triangle using four blue lines in the form of a kitten.

name: Balmer Peak
stats: Add or remove 25% of target project's total required progress to its current progress.
flavorText: Developers! Developers! Developers! Developers!

name: Research
stats: Draw 2 action cards.
flavorText: FOR SCIENCE!!!!!!!!

name: Agile Methodology
stats: Your team members gain +1 base commit this turn.
flavorText: My estimate is 21....BLACKJACK!!!!

name: Road Trip
stats: Target a student and one of your students, both commit half during their next commit
flavorText: Guys, theres this thing in that one city.  We're going!

name: Winter Ball
stats: Untill your next turn, each company only has one student commit.
flavorText: The goal is to not get arrested by the end of the night

name: Career Fair
stats: Starting with you and going left, each player draws a student and may choose to replace one of their current students.
flavorText: Making it rain resumes to get all the jobs.

name: ImagineRIT
stats: Until your next turn, all students gain base +1 progress
flavorText: Such innovation, very inspire.

name: Hockey Finals
stats: Until your next turn, all students commit half progress
flavorText: Wait, we have a sports team?

name: Search Engine IN.
stats: Student has +2 for web projects

name: Pineapple
stats: Student has +2 for mobile projects

name: Macrohard
stats: Student has +2 for desktop projects

name: Box Core (Amazon)
stats: Student has +1 to any project

name: OutofIt Corp. (Intuit)
stats: Student has +1 to any project

name: Lutz
stats: Target project gains +4 progress
flavorText: I can write software at an incredibly high rate, as long as it doesn't have to work.

name: Malachowsky
stats: Draw 1 action card. Target project gains +2 progress
flavorText: "I was the character in many of my classes, I still am."

name: Krutz
stats: Discard Hand draw 3 cards.
flavorText: "As long as you're all reasonably sober and coherent, you'll all get full credit!"

name: Stand Up meeting
stats: Your team members gain +1 base commit this turn.
flavorText: Great now we are four dev's standing around in a circle, what now?

name: Free food
stats: Your team members gain +1 base commit this turn.
flavorText: Its not the apocalypse, it's the rumbling of the heard of interns heading to the kitchen.

name: Morning cup of coffee
stats: Your team members gain +1 base commit this turn.
flavorText: Nothing starts the day out right unless you have chugged a gallon of coffee.

name: Code review
stats: Your team members gain +1 base commit this turn.
flavorText: It's not a bug its a feature

name: Lunch w/ coworkers
stats: Target student has -1 base commit this turn.
flavorText: Food now, work latter.

name: Rampup
stats: Target student has -1 base commit this turn.
flavorText: I have no idea what I am doing

name: Broke the build
stats: Target student has -1 base commit this turn.
flavorText: FIX IT! FIX IT! FIX IT! FIX IT! FIX IT! FIX IT! FIX IT! FIX IT! FIX IT!

name: Dead Battery
stats: Target student has -1 base commit this turn.
flavorText: I couldn't do work today, my mouse would not move around.

name: Relocating Workspace
stats: Target student has -1 base commit this turn.
flavorText: There are windows, OOOO SQUIRREL!!!

name: Software Bug: QA
stats: For one turn, target CEO cannot play action cards during their turn (cards already played are still in effect).
flavorText: Someone broke the gravity; fix it!

name: Software Bug: QA
stats: For one turn, target CEO cannot play action cards during their turn (cards already played are still in effect).
flavorText: The bugs are breeding quickly; get the raid!

name: Software Bug: QA
stats: For one turn, target CEO cannot play action cards during their turn (cards already played are still in effect).
flavorText: Unicrons are flying across the screen!

name: Software Bug: QA
stats: For one turn, target CEO cannot play action cards during their turn (cards already played are still in effect).
flavorText: The network went down; go pick it up.

name: Software Bug: QA
stats: For one turn, target CEO cannot play action cards during their turn (cards already played are still in effect).
flavorText: Why doesn't this work?  I bet I need to download more RAM.

name: Software Bug: QA
stats: For one turn, target CEO cannot play action cards during their turn (cards already played are still in effect).
flavorText: I don't know how to program on Mars.  Why am I here?
